adjective.description: Denoting or relating to an event that occurs immediately before a particular sports game.
examples: he threw out the first pitch during the pregame ceremonies

noun.description: A television or radio program in which commentators discuss a sports game which is about to take place.
examples: the comments in question were made during last night's pregame

verb.description: Drink alcohol before attending an event or social function.
examples: a lot of the teenagers had pregamed before they got there
